senses.de: Not pay attention to, not acknowledge when seen, heard or perceived in some way
senses.ex: She chose to ignore the rude comments.

Tips.title: Social Implications
Tips.description: Ignoring can be seen as disrespectful or amicable depending on context, such as not reacting to aggression.
Tips.example: She ignored their taunts, showing dignity.

Tips.title: Potential Consequences
Tips.description: Be aware that neglecting matters, like requests or problems, might lead to bigger issues later.
Tips.example: If you ignore this leak, it could cause major damage.

Tips.title: Selective Ignoring
Tips.description: People sometimes ignore only certain aspects while still being engaged with the overall situation.
Tips.example: He ignored the background noise, focusing on the music.

senses.ex: In the final report, they ignored all the other options.

Tips.title: Academic Precision
Tips.description: In academic contexts, ignoring can imply a careful decision to exclude certain details for clarity.
Tips.example: The study ignores outlier data points to focus on the trend.

Tips.title: Breadth of Exclusion
Tips.description: Ignoring in a comprehensive report suggests deliberation; what's omitted is often as telling as what's included.
Tips.example: The policy ignored any benefits, focusing only on the drawbacks.

Tips.title: Consideration and Rejection
Tips.description: Ignoring ideas can mean they were considered but then rejected as irrelevant or unimportant.
Tips.example: We reviewed your idea but chose to ignore it for the current project.

Brush off.wordDefinition:
Brush off means to dismiss something or someone casually or without giving much attention or importance to it.

For example, if someone came up to you and told you a lame joke, and you responded with a smile and quick "ha ha, very funny," then you just brushed them off.

Dismiss.wordDefinition:
Dismiss means to reject or disregard something as unimportant or unworthy of consideration.

It is typically used in more formal or serious situations, such as a judge dismissing a case or a manager dismissing an employee from their job.

Dismiss carries a stronger connotation of actively rejecting something, while ignore simply implies a lack of attention or acknowledgement.

Disregard.wordDefinition:
Disregard means to not pay attention to something, but with the understanding that it may be important. For example, if your teacher tells you to disregard a certain page in your textbook, it means that you should not focus on that page, but it could become important at a later time.

Disregard implies that the thing being ignored might be important, while ignore implies a deliberate effort to avoid something.

Minimize.wordDefinition:
Minimize means to reduce the impact or importance of something. It's used when you want to acknowledge something's existence but make it seem less significant.

For example, if you're talking about a mistake you made, you might try to minimize its impact by pointing out that it wasn't a big deal in the grand scheme of things.

To sum up, if you want to completely disregard something, you can use ignore, whereas if you want to acknowledge something but make it seem less important, you can use "minimize."

Neglect.wordDefinition:
Neglect means to fail to take care of something/someone properly, often resulting in harm or damage. It is applicable in situations where there is a responsibility to respond, but it is not fulfilled.

Example: If you forget to feed your pet for a long time, you are neglecting it and causing it harm.

Overlook.wordDefinition:
Overlook means to unintentionally not notice something or someone, or to forgive or disregard a mistake. It is applicable when you accidentally miss something or when you choose to forgive someone or overlook their mistake.

Ignore means intentionally avoiding something while overlook means unintentionally missing something or forgiving a mistake.

Tune out.wordDefinition:
Tune out means to unintentionally not pay attention to something or someone. It means you are not aware of it because you're not focused on it.

It's like when you're reading a book and someone is talking to you, you tune them out without even realizing it.

quotes.Text: When someone is bullying you, don't let it get to you. I remember my friends in school, someone said something mean to them, and they really let it get to them. And it really affected them. But I would just say try to ignore it as much as possible and just be yourself.
quotes.Title: American Actress
quotes.Name: Kaitlyn Dever

quotes.Text: Of course I am political. You 'ave to be don't you? Every day it is about your future, your right to that future. 'Ow can people ignore this? We 'ave to leave a good world for our children, n'est-ce pas?
quotes.Title: French Actress
quotes.Name: Emmanuelle Beart

quotes.Text: Nobody talks about the poor. Everybody talks about the middle class and just kinda want to ignore that the poor exist. And you cannot ignore that they exist if you want to help them.
quotes.Title: American Politician
quotes.Name: Nina Turner

quotes.Text: If we intend to provide a better life, and a better world, for future generations, we can't ignore the quality of the environment we leave them.
quotes.Title: American Politician
quotes.Name: John Kasich

quotes.Text: As long as you aren't hurting anyone through your post, just do what makes you happy and what is important for you and ignore others.
quotes.Title: Indian Musician
quotes.Name: Shibani Dandekar

quotes.Text: Ultimately, the idea of being able to escape and lose myself in a new world every time I go to 'work' was too appealing to ignore.
quotes.Title: American Director
quotes.Name: Reed Morano

quotes.Text: A book is a version of the world. If you do not like it, ignore it; or offer your own version in return.
quotes.Title: Indian Novelist
quotes.Name: Salman Rushdie

quotes.Text: I'm not going to stand by and ignore things that I think are important to talk about.
quotes.Title: American Lawyer
quotes.Name: Richard Cordray

quotes.Text: You must pay for your sins. If you have already paid, please ignore this notice.
quotes.Title: American Author
quotes.Name: Sam Levenson

quotes.Text: I spent a great deal of my life being ignored. I was always very happy that way.
quotes.Title: American Artist
quotes.Name: Saul Leiter
